illu_pancreas_duodenum.jpg | Caption = 1: Head of pancreas 2: Uncinate
process of pancreas 3: Pancreatic notch 4: Body of pancreas 5: Anterior
surface of pancreas 6: Inferior surface of pancreas 7: Superior margin of
pancreas 8: Anterior margin of pancreas 9: Inferior margin of
pancreas 10: Omental tuber 11: Tail of pancreas 12: Duodenum | Image2 =
| Caption2 = | System = | MeshName = | MeshNumber = | DorlandsPre = m_04 |
DorlandsSuf = 12514485 | }} The 'Inferior margin of pancreas' separates the
posterior from the inferior surface; the superior mesenteric vessels emerge
under its right extremity.
